EmailTemplate.name: Work Item Assignment Removal
EmailTemplate.Body: #if ($requesterName) $requesterName #{else} The system #{end} has removed the following work item from your queue: $workItemName.
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying work item assignee that a workitem has been removed from their queue.

Argument.name: item
Argument.Description: The WorkItem that is being reassigned.

Argument.name: workItemName
Argument.Description: The description property of the WorkItem.

Argument.name: requesterName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that requested the assignment.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Work item assignment removed: $workItemName
